comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Yuvaraja is a title, like "crown prince." In 1915, the Yuvaraja of Mysore was Kanteerava Narasimharaja Wodeyar (1888-1940): www.indianetzone.com/59/kanteerava_narasimharaja_wodeyar.htm en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanteerava_Narasimharaja_Wadiyar This was his older brother: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Krishna_Raja_Wadiyar_IV

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We will update our record.
